name: Cut Throat City
description: Set after Hurricane Katrina, four boyhood friends out of options reluctantly accept an offer to pull off a dangerous heist in the heart of New Orleans.

review.author: gilesadhamilton
review.heading: The usual thing
review.reviewBody: Umpteenth film about young American black men behaving like animals. I expect it's true to life. Why wouldn't it be? These people and their viewers seem to revel in it.

keywords: heist,strip club,female nudity,female topless nudity,hurricane katrina
